gametools

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • gametools.Area
      • gametools.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends Area
    Used to represent game objects or characters. Contains methods for movement, animation and collision.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DR_EAST
      Movement in the east (right) direction.
      static int DR_NORTH
      Movement in the north (upward) direction.
      static int DR_NORTH_EAST
      Diagonal movement in the north east (upward and rightward) direction.
      static int DR_NORTH_WEST
      Diagonal movement in the north west (upward and leftward) direction.
      static int DR_SOUTH
      Movement in the south (downward) direction.
      static int DR_SOUTH_EAST
      Diagonal movement in the south east (downward and rightward) direction.
      static int DR_SOUTH_WEST
      Diagonal movement in the south west (downward and leftward) direction.
      static int DR_UNDEFINED
      No movement or movement that does not follow a pre-defined direction.
      static int DR_WEST
      Movement in the west (left) direction.
      static int RT_CLOCK_WISE
      Clockwise sprite rotation.
      static int RT_COUNTER_CLOCK_WISE
      Counter-clockwise sprite rotation.

      • Fields inherited from class gametools.Area

        CL_INSIDE, CL_INSIDE_X, CL_INSIDE_Y, CL_TOUCH, CL_TOUCH_X, CL_TOUCH_Y, CR_BOTTOM_LEFT, CR_BOTTOM_RIGHT, CR_TOP_LEFT, CR_TOP_RIGHT, height, UNDEFINED_AREA, width, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite()
      Creates a blank placeholder sprite without an image or animation.
      Note: This sprite may cause errors if it is attempted to be drawn without an image or animation first set.
      Sprite(Animation animation)
      Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom animation.
      Sprite(Position pos, Animation animation)
      Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
      Sprite(Sprite sprite)
      Creates a sprite and copies over the properties from the passed in object.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Draws the sprite and updates its animation.

      Animation getAnimation() 
      Area getArea()
      Returns the sprite converted to an area object.
      Area getImageArea()
      Returns the full area of the rotated image.

      Returns the direction the sprite was moved in the previous or current frame.

      Returns the area in which the sprite is allowed to move with the movement commands.
      Animation getPreviousAnimation()

      void lockMovementArea(Area area)
      Defines the area the sprite can move inside.
      void moveAt(double ang)
      Moves the sprite at the passed in angle at the set speed.
      void moveConstantlyAt(double ang)
      Moves the sprite constantly at the specified angle until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.
      void moveConstantlyTo(int direction)
      Moves the sprite constantly in the specified direction until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.
      void moveConstantlyTo(Position pos)
      Moves the sprite constantly to the specified position until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.

      Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at the set speed.
      void moveTo(int direction, int speed)
      Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at a custom speed.
      void moveTo(Position pos)
      Moves the sprite to the coordinates at the set speed.

      Rotates the sprite around its center.

      Assigns a new animation to the sprite.
      void setSpeed(int speed)
      Sets the speed the sprite will move at when using its move methods.
      void stopConstantlyMoving()
      Disables the sprite from moving constantly if it was set to do so in a different method.
      protected void update()
      An empty method that runs before the draw method and should be overridden for custom code.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite()
        Creates a blank placeholder sprite without an image or animation.
        Note: This sprite may cause errors if it is attempted to be drawn without an image or animation first set.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(Animation animation)
        Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom animation.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation for the sprite.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(Sprite sprite)
        Creates a sprite and copies over the properties from the passed in object.
        Parameters:
        sprite - The sprite to copy the properties from.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(Position pos,
              Animation animation)
        Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the sprite.
        animation - The image for the sprite.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpeed

        public int getSpeed()
        Returns:
        The speed the sprite moves at.

      • getAnimation

        public Animation getAnimation()
        Returns:
        The current animation on the sprite.

      • getMovementArea

        public Area getMovementArea()
        Returns the area in which the sprite is allowed to move with the movement commands.
        Returns:
        The area in which the sprite is allowed to move within or the constant for an undefined area if none is currently set.

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Returns:
        The current angle of the sprite.

      • getArea

        public Area getArea()
        Returns the sprite converted to an area object.
        Returns:
        An area that represents the sprite.

      • getImageArea

        public Area getImageArea()
        Returns the full area of the rotated image.
        Returns:
        An area that completely covers the rotated image.

      • getLastDirection

        public int getLastDirection()
        Returns the direction the sprite was moved in the previous or current frame. Returns -1 (undefined direction) if the sprite was not recently moved or was moved in a direction not defined by one of the constants.
        Returns:
        The last direction the sprite was moved.

      • getPreviousAnimation

        public Animation getPreviousAnimation()
        Returns:
        The previous animation of the sprite, or the constant for an undefined animation if no previous animation was set.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int speed)
        Sets the speed the sprite will move at when using its move methods.
        Parameters:
        speed - The amount of pixels the sprite will move each frame.

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(Animation animation)
        Assigns a new animation to the sprite.
        Parameters:
        animation - A new animation for the sprite.

      • setAngle

        public void setAngle(double ang)
        Rotates the sprite around its center.
        Parameters:
        ang - The new angle of the sprite.

      • lockMovementArea

        public void lockMovementArea(Area area)
        Defines the area the sprite can move inside. A sprite will not be able to go outside this area using the movement commands however the sprite can still get outside this area using the setters for its x and y.
        Parameters:
        area - The area inside which the sprite can move unrestrictedly.

      • moveAt

        public void moveAt(double ang)
        Moves the sprite at the passed in angle at the set speed.
        Parameters:
        ang - A double of the angle in radians.

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(Position pos)
        Moves the sprite to the coordinates at the set speed.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position where the sprite should move to.

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(int direction,
                   int speed)
        Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at a custom speed.
        Parameters:
        direction - One of the direction constants that represents where the sprite should move to.
        speed - The speed at which to move at.

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(int direction)
        Moves the sprite at one of the defined directions at the set speed.
        Parameters:
        direction - One of the direction constants that represents where the sprite should move to.

      • moveConstantlyTo

        public void moveConstantlyTo(Position pos)
        Moves the sprite constantly to the specified position until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.
        Parameters:
        pos - The location to move constantly to.

      • moveConstantlyTo

        public void moveConstantlyTo(int direction)
        Moves the sprite constantly in the specified direction until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.
        Parameters:
        direction - One of the direction constants that represents where the sprite should move to.

      • moveConstantlyAt

        public void moveConstantlyAt(double ang)
        Moves the sprite constantly at the specified angle until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.
        Parameters:
        ang - The angle the sprite should move at in radians.

      • stopConstantlyMoving

        public void stopConstantlyMoving()
        Disables the sprite from moving constantly if it was set to do so in a different method.

      • update

        protected void update()
        An empty method that runs before the draw method and should be overridden for custom code.

      • draw

        public final void draw()
        Draws the sprite and updates its animation.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Area
